name: Pico Park 2
description: PICO PARK is back with all new levels! Play with 2-8 players locally or online in this co-op action-puzzle game!

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo
description: Sin descripción

name: Powered Platformer Bundle
description: ~ Bob the Elementalist + NeonPowerUp! + TP Bullet ~

name: Cybernated
description: Near future, state security special agent E-9 is sent on the most difficult operation of her career - to track down and eliminate the head of terrorist hackers, however, in the process it turns out that not everything is as simple as it seems... Hack&slash adventure game.

name: Goodnight, Sweetie
description: One day, the protagonist begins to have strange dreams. He's chased by bizarre dolls, and the cozy attic from his childhood feels unrealistically large. He must navigate between dream and reality to understand why this happens. Always treat Teddy with respect; he loves you and remembers everything.

name: Spiritgrapher: The Asylum 99
description: A retroy style first-person horror adventure set in an abandoned hospital. You are a spiritgrapher, your camera can see what is beyond the reach of the human eye. Head to an abandoned hospital and shoot a report about supernatural events.

name: The Heft Effect
description: A girl who mysteriously gains weight and learns to like it, two other girls that she pressures into gaining weight, and [TOPIC NOT FOUND]

name: The Upper Hand
description: The Upper Hand is a platformer where you must climb through each level as an alien to reach your freedom. Versatility and adaptability are rewarded as you use our deck builder and pose system to create your own path to reach the top.

name: Ship on Wheels
description: Welcome to Ship on Wheels, an exciting arcade racing game! Easily join the official seasons or create your own custom tracks. Players can also design unique arenas with mini-games. Dive in and start racing!

name: Cat Bait
description: Cat Bait is a casual game with cute pixel graphics. Control the Cat Bait, dodge enemies, and use the unique abilities of helper cats.

name: Grocery Simulator
description: Experience the thrill of managing your own grocery store, from stocking shelves to handling customers, and transforming a small shop into a thriving supermarket. Control prices, Order goods, Hire Staff, Fight with Thieves and much more.

name: Pirate's Money
description: Welcome to Pirate's Money, the ultimate adventure on the seven seas, where strategy, courage and cunning determine who will reign over the treacherous waters of Pirate's Island! Your legend begins now. Raise the sails, load the cannons and win BIG in Pirate's Money.

name: Industring
description: A minimalistic urban planning puzzle. Manage resources and building locations. Accumulate knowledge points and discover the secrets of the destroyed planet

name: Dead by Daylight: Castlevania Chapter
description: So comes the very night incarnate, accursed and ravenous, for darkness is Dracula’s domain. With the ability to transform into the vile denizens of the woods and conjure unnatural flames, all mortals shall succumb to The Dark Lord’s vengeance.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Ultimate Edition
description:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Ultimate Edition includes the base game, the season pass, the Rogue Infiltrator bundle, the Sabacc Shark bundle, a digital art book, and 3 days early access.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Gold Edition
description:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Gold Edition includes the base game, the season pass, and 3 days early access.

name: Hollow Floor
description: Hollow Floor is an exploration-based single-sitting Metroidvania inspired by VVVVVV and REDDER. Hollow Floor is a relaxed game that is full of secrets and hard challenges that can be tackled at any moment in the game or completely ignored.

name: Legacy of Epstein: Foul Dreamer
description: Following the events of his "Bad Omen", Juglio arrives in the fallen city of Gettysburg to search for his friend Lenny.

name: Put it here
description: "Put it Here" is a casual puzzle gameplay that includes item storage, arrangement,Here players need to place scattered items according to certain rules. A variety of interesting and healing levels are waiting for you to unlock!

name: Orbs of Chaos
description: Choose 3 orbs, and have access to 10 spell combinations at any time in this retro survivor rogue-lite. Destroy hordes of Lovecraftian horrors, and battle unique bosses that rise from the Chaos every 3 minutes. Only limit is your speed and memory.

name: The Land of the Magnates
description: An epic adventure of love, betrayal, and sacrifice awaits, rooted in Middle Eastern myths and legends! As Shahbaz, a disgraced prince, travel across magical realms, defeat minions of darkness with the magic of your sitar, and reclaim your throne, bringing the light back to the Land of the Sun.

name: Smite 2
description: Become a god and wage war in SMITE 2, the Unreal Engine 5-powered sequel to the legendary third-person action MOBA. If you love challenging competition, intense action, ability-driven combat, rewarding teamwork, or godly mythology, you’ll see why 40+ million players love SMITE.

name: Mechanical Lab
description: Mechanical Lab is a 2D action game focused on the physical interaction of machines with the environment. Explore, build and experiment to survive in the city of robots long after the end of human civilization.

name: Risk of Rain 2: Seekers of the Storm
description: A new storm gathers over Petrichor V and with it comes an ancient threat. Master new survivors and wield new items as you fight your way across uncharted regions of Petrichor V. Ascend the Colossus, defeat The False Son, and unlock the true power of his Soul.

name: Risk of Rain 2: EXXXXXXX-X
description: An ancient threat awakens on Petrichor V. Master new Survivors, wield new items, and fight your way across uncharted regions. Ascend the levels of the Colossus in a race to confront The False Son. Defeat him and unlock the true power of his Soul!

name: Lilim Wants to Lv Up
description: One night a beautiful girl suddenly appeared in my room, not only dressed in cool and sexy clothes, but also with horns and a tail.The self-proclaimed succubus Lilim came to the human world to become stronger, and my hoarded sexual desire was the perfect target for her.

name: Adventures of Deliveryman
description: Prepare for your first day of work as a delivery man, ride your bike, make deliveries, meet new people. Enjoy a delivery-filled story driven adventure in the not-too-distant future and discover the true nature of city's existence.

name: Q2 Humanity
description: he smash hit game “Q REMASTERED”, which became extremely popular amongst users in Japan in early 2023, is now coming back! "Q2 HUMANITY" is finally available as Early Access! In "Q2" the sequel to "Q1" you can play as a character yourself. You can fly, jump, run, draw, grab, throw, and so on.

name: Monster Run: Downfall of the Empire
description: Monster Run is a dark fantasy beat’em up with roguelite elements. Fight as a giant monster cat protecting your home forest. Destroy massive armies of human soldiers and their allies. Evolve your attacks, master non-human tactics, and discover the joy of breathing fire.

name: Crypt Custodian
description: Crypt Custodian is a charming metroidvania about cleaning up the afterlife. Play as Pluto- a mischievous cat who has died, and is sentenced to be the afterworlds janitor... forever! Hang out with other doomed ghosts, battle beasts, and explore a vastly expansive landscape.

name: Factor Y
description:
Factor Y is a relaxing, large-scale, multi-planetary, mega factory automation game.
Mine resources, craft new items and structures via recipes and generate your own, custom building blocks.
Expand your factory to span across multiple planets.

name: Deitrus
description: In Deitrus, heroes are forced to fight for the sake of their techno fantasy world through fast-paced, grid-based, combat, but not everyone is up to the task…

name: Core Keeper
description: Explore an endless cavern of creatures, relics and resources in a mining sandbox adventure for 1-8 players. Mine, build, fight, craft and farm to unravel the mystery of the ancient Core.

name: Peglin
description: Peglin is a Pachinko Roguelike - Fight enemies by collecting special orbs and popping pegs to deal damage. Acquire special relics that radically change the game and ensure no two runs are the same. Aim carefully to survive in this unique turn-based RPG!

name: Super Cute Alien
description: 1-4 players platformer about friendship, love and what it means to be human. Adventure, action and puzzles, contrasting cute and gore effects, also including RPG elements.

name: Rain on Your Parade + Just Crow Things
description: Sin descripción

name: Sprout Valley: Anniversary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sprunki Incredibox
description:
Sprunki is an online music creation tool inspired by Incredibox, allowing players to mix beats and create tracks by arranging characters with unique sounds.
It is also a horror parody of Incredibox, creepypasta style.

name: Wartales: The Pits
description: Dive into the black markets where the wealthiest brigands in the Five Kingdoms hold secret battles. Engage in intense battles in this combat-focused content, designed to test your strategic and tactical skills. Will you be brave enough to face this challenge?

name: Love Is...
description: "Love is..." is a hidden picture game with emotional art by artist 'Puuung'. It is a healing game that can relieve stress and excitement like relaxation, and enjoy the charming emotional coloring game that spreads at your fingertips.

name: Backwater Eulogy
description:
Backwater Eulogy is a stream of consciousness, autobiographical exploration of loss and the double-sided nature of grief. Told as a linear narrative, there are no choices, and there are no alternate endings. Sit and stay for a moment, before leaving.

Taking the form of a short visual novel, this is a short story of sorts about grief, moving on, and life in the rural Midwest. As a "kinetic novel" there are no alternative routes or choices- just one storyline to follow to its inevitable conclusion. Placing an emphasis on a small, curated experience, it is best experienced in one sitting.

name: Hentai World: Ultra Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Sprout Valley: Nico's Skins
description: Sin descripción

name: Helix Fruit Jump
description: Helix Fruit Jump is a casual arcade game where you control a ball that bounces through a platform made of fruit and cake slices.

name: Cyberpunk Speed Assassin
description: Control time, strike fast, or don’t survive.

name: Fragrant Story and Papaya's Path
description: Smells like trouble! This tactical RPG puts a new spin on the classic genre, with characters from Otosan guided by Rhubarb and Papaya

name: Fruits' Harvest Sorter
description: Sort the fruits of this season!

name: Up Shot
description: Sin descripción

name: Press Paws: Idle Clicker
description: Press Paws is a casual, laid-back and cute Idle Clicker Game in Pixel Art style with mini-games.

name: Sakura Succubus 9
description: In the ninth part of the Sakura Succubus series, Hiroki returns to Astoria with Ayu as she prepares for the concert of a lifetime: a joint show with her fellow idol Mihama Shizuru. Will this concert end in success, and will Hiroki's harem get even bigger?

name: Wladyslaw
description: You are a citizen of the Władysław Empire. Sealed from the outside world by towering Walls you get mixed up in a ritual that changes your body. Now trapped in the Castle of Władysław only one thing is on your mind. Can you escape the Castle?

name: Along Came a Spider: Valley of The Hollow
description: Sin descripción

name: Resident Fear 2
description: Take part in heart-stopping first-person action with waves of ravenous zombies. Use your weapons wisely, keep your ammo count at bay, and stay focused—all decisions are literally matters of life and death.

name: Electric Fairyland
description: Join Stix the fairy on an a tiny 3D adventure through the dense undergrowth of a fantasy garden. A bite-sized collectathon inspired by 90s platformers and childrens' picture books.

name: Fairy Tail: Dungeons
description: Fairy Tail: Dungeons is a deck-building rogue-lite featuring characters from the Fairy Tail series. Collect Magic Cards based on moves from the series to build your own unique deck and take down powerful monsters as you head for the dungeon depths!

name: Cathy and The Others
description: The sound of a pickup truck starting. A hammering headache. And this locked room. What happened to Cathy? Cathy And The Others offers a narrative experience where the player must escape a strange house.

name: The Simp
description: A horror decryption game. The player needs to carefully observe the interactive items in the scene and deduce how to crack them. Time to test courage and patience!

name: Ham Pafe: Hamster no Sweets Puzzle
description: This is a puzzle game that combines easy difficulty and hamster raising for little kids to enjoy. Let's raise various hamsters in a cage!

name: Hue Hop
description: Hue Hop is a visually captivating color-matching game in a minimalist isometric world. Navigate a luminous circle across a grid of colorful rings, aligning matching colors to score points. With intuitive controls and a competitive scoring system, it offers a relaxing yet challenging experience.

name: Find it! Festival in the Hotel
description: We are holding the Find it! festival in the hotel! Walk around the rooms and search for hidden items. In rooms filled with many things, can you find the items you're looking for? Enjoy 10 different themed rooms.

name: False Mall
description: You have wandered into an infinite looping shopping mall in Japan. If you notice changes within the mall, you might be able to escape.

name: Floor 9: Beginning
description: In Floor 9, you find yourself trapped in a mysterious hotel known as "Hotel Liminal." To escape, you must identify anomalies on each floor. These anomalies can be anywhere - on the ground, in paintings, or even right in front of your eyes.

name: FFS, Another Northern Duke?!
description: There's only one goal here: survive. Seduce the Duke?! Expelled from the modern world into a novel, you occupy the body of a minor villainess, on her way to marry the beastly Duke of the North. (Why does that sound familiar...) A Fantasy + Romance + Slice-of-Life Otome Visual Novel.

name: Gamer Stories: Dating Real Japanese Female Gamers
description: This is a game where you can date real Japanese female gamers. Through dates, you can learn about each character's actual life experiences and hardships, getting to know them deeply. All of them share the common trait of being gamers, so you, who love games, will have lively conversations with them.

name: Herta's Chess Game
description: Herta's simulated universe network is interconnected throughout the universe. Pack your luggage and enter Herta's world with your friends. In this fan game, you will use the simulation data of each original character to have a strategic showdown with Herta.

name: 200 Hidden House Cats
description: Uh-oh! 200 mischievous house cats are causing mayhem in homes everywhere! Embark on a purr-suit to find them all!

name: Monster Jam Showdown: Big Air Edition
description: Feel the adrenaline rush with Monster Jam Showdown - Big Air Edition! Pre-order now and, in addition to the full game, you'll get: Season Pass, the two DLCs Law & Disorder and The Odd Couple and 3 days of early access!

name: Colorma
description: Think you've mastered the world of color? Think again! Colorma, an innovative puzzle game, challenges your perception and creativity like never before. Place color tiles, create stunning gradients and conquer intricate challenges on grids that bend and twist like a crossword puzzle. Decoys, clones and keyless levels will test your spatial reasoning and unlock your inner color wizard.

name: Containment Initiative 2
description: Containment Initiative 2 is a local asymmetric co-op VR shooter which can be played by two people on the same PC. Kill zombies alone in VR or have a friend cover you by using the mouse and keyboard. Explore and scavenge to unlock new gear and weapons to help you survive the infected horde!

name: Sorelle
description: Welcome to the magical world of Sorelle: a whimsical 3D puzzle-platformer that immerses you in the magical seaside town of Isola Chiara. Play as sisters Alessandra, Bella, and Capri as you explore the magic of sisterhood in a puzzle-solving adventure to restore magic and save the summer festival.

name: AbraTabia Kingdom
description: AbraTabia is a magical adventure game where you can build and defend your own kingdom . Grow your citizen population while managing food, gold and resources. Upgrade buildings and research technologies to enhance your soldiers and player character. PVP battles with armies, siege weapons and more.

name: Urayama
description: Urayama is a psychological J-horror game featuring students on summer vacation.

name: DeSoloFender
description: a tower defense game in a 3D environment. Unique interface design and damage system which significantly increases the strategy factor. With a choice of 4 different weapons and a lot of improvement options, this game is perfect for putting your strategic skills to the test.

name: Brave Quest
description: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Mission: Rift Seeker
description: Mission: Rift seeker is a colony simulation game about building and managing your base on an unknown planet and exploring the surrounding void rifts that are full of horrific and mysterious entities that you are tasked to capture before they to eat the brave and fluffy seekers that you command.

name: Commando Hero 2: First Blood
description: Hero who wants to be a commando has to pass difficult tracks. Finish the track fast and enter the Leaderboard.

name: Squigley
description: Traverse and experience a massive, cohesive 2D world as Squigley. Use your wits, resources and unique movement mechanics in order to explore this dark digital world.

name: Psychomachia
description: Dive into the psychological horror of Psychomachia, trapped in a terrifying loop at the heart of the madness-infested dormitories. Explore the twisted depths of the human mind, confronted by terrifying manifestations of insanity.

name: Broadside Renegades
description: Broadside Renegades combines auto-firing weapons with manual ship abilities in a rogue-like space pirate adventure. Choose your captain and upgrade your ship to steal the space kings booty. Warp ahead to stay alive, and mind your bearing.

name: Inn Tycoon
description: Inn Tycoon is a relaxing and enjoyable game, offering you the opportunity to build, design, and manage your own inn.

name: Snezhinka: Sentinel Girls 2
description: A high-tempo shooter with simple controls. Enhance your character with cards and defend various targets as an employee of a private military company.

name: World of Warcraft: The War Within
description:
Journey through never-before-seen subterranean worlds filled with hidden wonders and lurking perils, down to the dark depths of the nerubian empire, where the malicious Harbinger of the Void is gathering arachnid forces to bring Azeroth to its knees.

Deep beneath the surface lies treasure vaults waiting to be discovered with Delves. Explore these world instances solo or with up to four friends, along with an NPC companion, to defeat bosses and gain epic end-game loot.

Expand the potential of your alternate characters with account-wide progression across your family of characters on your Battle.net account with Warbands. Share your Warband Bank access, War Within Renown, achievements, collections, and more.

Rise to new heights of power with new Hero Talent trees. Each class specialization has access to two choices of self-contained Hero Talent trees inspired by iconic Warcraft universe archetypes.

name: Brawlberry
description: Battle the fruit guardians as you hack and slash through the fruit scape in this coop rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far
description: Unleash voxel warfare in 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far. Lead a modern military, build bases, unlock units, and attack in all-out war. Engage on land, sea and air in over 30 missions, online skirmishes, or co-op. Easy to learn, a challenge to master.

name: Motel Manager Simulator
description: Restore an old motel alongside a shop and a gas station. Design, furnish, decorate and rent rooms. provide products for customers and fuel for cars. Hire employees to help you and be the boss of your own empire.

name: Debtors' Club
description: Be the tax collector of a shady city hall in this narrative-driven resource management game. Talk to debtors, manage a team, make difficult choices, and challenge the city's moral decay. It's their money, but it's your job.

name: Z.O.N.A: Origin
description: Z.O.N.A: Origin is more than a game; it's your deep dive into a post-apocalyptic world. Here, every choice matters. Engage with a varied, enthralling open world, a suspenseful storyline, perilous anomalies, and potent artifacts in this thrilling game.

name: Endzone 2
description: Endzone 2 is a post-apocalyptic survival colony builder, where you embark to secure humanities survival after a cataclysmic disaster. Discover and repopulate the last habitable grounds, while the survival of your people hinges on your wits, foresight, and resilience in a harsh and unforgiving world.

name: Defenders of the Omniverse
description: Defenders of the Omniverse is a Reverse Bullet Hell Rogue-Lite set in a world between realities, where heroes and monsters from all across space and time face off in the final battle for the fate of the Omniverse!

name: Toy Shire
description: Are you prepared for a thrilling toy army tower defense adventure? Welcome The Toy Shire! Battle diverse foes in various locations, defend your family, and repel foes from your area. Save the world by strengthening your defense with toy towers!

name: Secret Backrooms 2
description: Secret Backrooms 2, A Sequel that you play as a facility worker that has noclipped through reality. uncover the secrets behind Delta's Experimental Facility and how the backrooms was discovered.

name: Halls of Torment
description: Slay hordes of terrifying monsters in this casual roguelite action rpg. Descend into the Halls of Torment where the lords of the underworld await you. Treasures, magic trinkets, and a growing cast of heroes will grant you the power to vanquish the horrors from beyond. How long can you survive?

name: Genba no Kizuna
description: A mesozoic murder mystery, 4 suspects, 1 truth. Investigate, interrogate and present evidence as you set out to unravel the case with your team. Will you be able to accurately determine who took the victim's life? Or will your deductions lead you to arrest someone for a crime they did not commit...?

name: Super Mario Eclipse
description: Super Mario Eclipse is part beta restoration, part enhancement, part original mod, and all fan service. With dozens upon dozens of new missions, fully custom worlds, challenging secret courses, and an interconnected Isle Delfino to boot, this is the Super Mario Sunshine experience you always wanted- and then some!

name: Voltaire: The Vegan Vampire
description: An action-farming-roguelite, full of whimsical flora and mischievous creatures that really want to ruin your dark and mysterious plans of… Going vegan!

name: Vesper: Ether Saga
description: The perfect union between video games and comics.

name: Koboo: The Tree Spirit
description: An action rogue-lite platformer with strategy and RPG elements. Play as a tree spirit named 'Koboo' as you befriend animals and protect the ancient forest against hunters and an ever expanding industry seeking to destroy it.

name: Marmoreal
description: Marmoreal is a Bullet Hell Action RPG with magical girls, swords and fully automatic crossbows. Join the Mages of the Arcanum and the Warriors of Melkirion in their quest to stop the evil Necromancer!

name: Rum & Gun
description: Journey across the Indian Ocean, uncover the secrets of the Drunken God, and become a legendary pirate captain. Rum & Gun mixes fast-paced shooter action with light ARPG elements. You're not on the Caribbean anymore...

name: Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Glitch
description: Glitch :) would have been a great, calm and fun game... If it weren't completely corrupted. A terrible virus has invaded the game's files and left it completely bugged. Fortunately, when even the hero of the story gets completely stuck, from the confines of the game's files, there's hope...

name: The Troll Sides
description:
Welcome to the Troll Sides!
This is a brand new campaign with remixed versions of the base game levels, with trolls!

- 7 chapters
- 2 intermission chapters
- Beginner accessible
- Playtested
- 220 hours of work

name: Panic Road
description: Try to reach home through the streams of people trying not to feel panic, your complexes and thoughts will prevent you from going through all this social horror, but you can easily help the main character just by closing the bad thought through the cross! If only this could be done in real life...

name: Individualism In The Dead Internet Age: An Anti Big Tech Asset Flip
description:
This is an interactive-essay-meets-walking-sim about technocapitalism and the things we lost along the way.
Follow coins under the electric mist of a clouded starry sky. Discover hyper-links. Listen to the words both inside and outside your head. Seal your fate before the productivity machine. Together we can defeat the machine.

name: El Camino Del Zorro
description: El Camino del Zorro or The Fox's Path in English is a platform game created for a school project. It's about our character, Foxy, who wants to return home. Along the way, he encounters some difficulties.

name: Shadowblade Knight Symphony
description: Embrace the darkness, bend reality, and carve your legend in shadowblade knight symphony.

name: Second Rate Superheroes
description: An addicting, chaotic, nerve-wracking action-roguelike in which you command 20 superhero former-rejects to protect yourself and the Mayor from tides of hell. With dozens of weapons, insane combos, 400+ upgrade "cards," your fingers will be sweating like you're wearing wool mittens in July.

name: Castles on Clouds
description: A Roguelike Tower Defense game set on a user controlled procedurally generated island. Select unique cards and relics that enhance your towers abilities, crafting powerful builds to defend against the growing hordes of enemies.

name: Sandbox World
description: Welcome to the Sandbox World! Here, you bring your ideas to life: create tanks, airplanes, ships, and anything else – with over 120 unique blocks at your disposal. Engage, defend, and showcase your masterpieces in exhilarating battles that await you!

name: Multitales
description: Crazy competitive top-down shooter in the multiverse of fairy tales and legends.

name: Dynasty Detective
description: DynastyDetective is a visual Nobel-style mystery story game set in the fictional Joseon Dynasty where monsters appear.

name: Aestik
description: Make impactful decisions in moral dilemma situations, which will impact the course of your journey through this atmospheric, hand-drawn metroidvania. Explore the hazardous paths of the Realm of Aestik and fight its corrupted inhabitants as you unravel its deep-rooted mysteries.

name: Lord of Rigel
description: Lord of Rigel is a turn-based 4X space strategy game. In a galaxy divided by two elder races, unite with other species or forge your own path alone. Navigate galactic council politics and defeat grand menaces while utilizing espionage, research, and military force. How will you shape the galaxy?

name: Shopping Mall Girl: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: This House Eats People
description: THIS HOUSE EATS PEOPLE is a short psx horror game where the player uses a Polaroid camera to take photos of an abandoned farmhouse. The game was created and submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2024.

name: Balloon Jerks
description: Bubble matching arcade game.

name: The Veiled Ones
description: The Veiled Ones is a horror stealth game about a Muslim exorcist trying to save his son from a jinn possession. In this game players will reveal the story behind their son's possession, while avoiding the jinn that haunts them.

name: Drift Master Simulator 2024: Rich Racer DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Drift Master Simulator 2024: Driving Sim - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Secrets: Moist Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Grand Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pool Together Bundle
description: Leave it all behind, kick back, and chill in Pool Together Bundle!

name: Panic Ball!
description: Try not to panic!

name: Descending
description:
An experimental game about operating drills and managing information.

Your new job takes you to the bottom of a giant pit, where the only thing to keep you company is an old one-way fax machine. Survive unrelenting underground storms and get back to the surface safely after finishing ten shifts.

name: This is Not Your House
description: Crush someone's skull, suffer from hypothermia, transcend your mortal frame, find all 10 endings. GET YOUR HOUSE BACK.

name: Correct Picture
description: Correct Picture is an engaging and educational game where players are challenged to match pictures on the left with their corresponding names on the right. The objective is to correctly pair as many names with images as possible. The more correct matches a player makes, the higher their score. This game tests and improves the player's recognition and association skills, making it both fun and informative.

name: Sprawl 96
description: Sprawl 96 adds enemies and gameplay from the 2023 game Sprawl into the original Quake.

name: Apprehend
description: This game features a white little character riding a mount that can spew fire

name: Underground Station
description:
An adventure into the mysterious world of the underground Labour Office begins.
Here, money decides everything.

name: Galaxy Rush
description: Feel the thrill of galactic racing! The most exhilarating grand prix of the spacefaring age is upon us, and the audience is waiting for you. Gear up and start your engines, for the Galaxy Rush is about to blast off!

name: Make Your Country Great Again
description: Here is a global multiplayer clicker/idle game where players from all over the world unite for a chance to restore global justice and make their country the greatest among all others. There has never been a game this global and massive!

name: Star: M
description: Diverse worlds, diverse battlefields, diverse gameplay, diverse appreciation, and diverse fun!

name: Lost Mastery
description: Roguelike deckbuilding meets memory gameplay. Embark on an adventure in Lost Mastery, a unique blend of card battles, memory gameplay and strategy. Collect powerful cards, battle mysterious enemies and uncover hidden secrets. Can you master the game?

name: Takeover
description: Takeover is a fast paced waifu hack and slash action game with a time attack feature. You will alternate stealth phase and combat phase. The game include a dynamic clothes system.

name: Echoes of The Backrooms
description: "Echoes of The Backrooms" is an indie horror game that masterfully captures the unsettling atmosphere of the Backrooms and the uncanny eeriness of liminal spaces. This game excels in creating an immersive experience with its cinema-quality visuals and meticulously crafted environments.

name: Vagneria
description:
Vagneria is a platform game that blends elements of RPG, item crafting, scenario exploration, and village expansion. Here, your goal is to assist in the construction of the village of Vagneria by completing missions for its residents and protecting the inhabitants from threats that may arise throughout the story.

Dive into an immersive gaming experience with randomly generated stages, exciting exploration, building mechanics, and thrilling battles. Get ready to become the hero the world needs!

name: Perfect Hand of Nostalpix
description: Perfect Hand of Nostalpix is a remaster of the 1989 digital card game classic. Defeat your foes with a deck you tweaked to perfection by collecting, upgrading and evolving each card, in this blast from the past enhanced with new mechanics!

name: Scourge of War: Gettysburg
description: Scourge of War: Gettysburg is a real-time strategy game that faithfully recreates the historic Civil War battle of Gettysburg.

name: Fashion Princess: Super Version
description: Sin descripción

name: The Storied Sword
description:
The Storied Sword is an action-platformer for retro consoles. Developed by Bite The Chili Productions and Raft Labs Interactive and published by Orc Face Games.

Assume the mantle of the mysterious folk hero Candlemaster Cedric or the elusive Orchid of Mourning, and wall-jump your way through the trials this fast-paced, multi-scrolling platformer has to offer.

Inspired by classics like Tecmo’s Ninja Gaiden and Sunsoft’s Batman, The Storied Sword is sure to raise the challenge level for NES Homebrew platformers and bring players the 8-bit twitch-combat style they know and love.

name: Mizi No!: Blank Slate
description:
Oh hi! Good to see you here.
In case you liked the puzzles in Mizi NO! and crave more, you have come to the right place.

The "Blank Slate" DLC is for the minimalists and players looking for a challenge. The items in this pack are designed to be more subtle and will challenge you to focus more on the puzzle shapes themselves!

The "Blank Slate" DLC contains 20 objects that Mizi will happily knock over. But only because it knows you like to glue them back together ;)

Oh hi! Good to see you here.

The "Playful Patterns" DLC adds 20 more items focusing on repeating patterns. Of course, Mizi will happily knock them over. But only because it knows you like to glue them back together ;)

name: Harvest Moon: Home Sweet Home
description:
Head back to your roots and leave the city life for your childhood village of Alba in Harvest Moon: Home Sweet Home, where the freshest fish and tastiest veggies are grown and caught by the local farmers and anglers!

However, with its population getting older and younger villagers leaving for the big city, Alba Village has seen better days, so can you help turn it from a village on the decline to one of prosperity? With its beautiful surroundings, Alba definitely has the potential, so work hard to bring tourists and even new residents to this sprawling green village! Reunite with your childhood friend and other familiar faces to help put Alba on the map!

name: Grand Prix Formula One
description: Live the intense experience of Formula One Racing !

name: Lost in Heart of Chernobyl: Survival
description: Survive the Shadows, Uncover the Truth.

name: Supermarket Manager Simulator
description: Manage your own shop! Chips, chips, meat, burgers, vegetables and fruit. Eggs, cheese, breakfast cereals, juices or milk - order all your products cheaply online and put them on the shelves.

name: Pawfect Cat Mansion
description: Create a feline paradise and turn an old mansion into a house full of adorable cats! Everyone loves cute little kittens!

name: Outbreak: Survival Kit Collection
description: Nine undead horrors await as you fight for survival across the Outbreak universe.

name: Memetomo
description: A turn-based card battle game with RPG elements, in which you must use more than 140 cat cards to win battles and become a “cat meme master”!

name: Telly the TV
description:
Telly the TV is a throwback action/adventure platformer with a 1-bit style. You'll explore six themed worlds while collecting Remote Control Keys in a scavenger hunt gone wild. Can you defeat the baddies of TV Kingdom and restore the airwaves?

Enter six exciting and quirky worlds while bashing baddies and traversing terrible traps! Collect items to save each TV program, and face-off with the enemies of TV Kingdom.

name: 60 Minute Marathon 2
description: 60 Minute Marathon 2 is a 74-map MBF21-compatible gigawad made (mostly) in a single hour, just like last time, but with more than twice the friends, including me, @Synami, and new friends @Phoenyx and @OverflowingMocha, twice the "production quality" as last time, and even a completely bespoke soundtrack made by Phoenyx! Much like the first 60 Minute Marathon, this was mostly a fairly simple yet somewhat extreme mapping exercise, this time with four mappers all making 16 maps over an hour and deciding to jam them all together at the end alternating between each mapper, with maps only being edited after the designated hour to actually make them possible.

name: Backyard Beans
description: Lovingly smack your loved ones and stylishly throw them into various things! As Backyard Beans, you meet where it hurts and joyfully brawl through your circle of friends.

name: Pokémon Emerald: Seaglass
description:
Pokemon Emerald Seaglass is a romhack of Pokemon Emerald with many alterations.

Notable features include:

- Complete visual overhaul of all game graphics to fit a cozy, GBC-like aesthetic

- All Pokémon from Generations 1-3 are obtainable, along with cross-generation evolutions (ex: Roserade, Mamoswine, Farigiraf)

- Tweaks to many traditionally “bad” Pokémon to make them more interesting and usable (ex: Ghost/Flying Noctowl, Grass/Dragon Sceptile, Water/Fire Octillery)

- Updated battle engine to most recent games (Physical/Special split, Fairy type, etc.)

- New minigames and events to bring life to Hoenn, such as a Scuba Diving competition in Pacifidlog Town and Pinball games used to unlock rare items and Alolan Eggs!

- Follower Pokemon

- The Rustboro City Wishing Well, using Wishing Star items as a currency in a gacha-like system to get random Pokémon! Great for shaking up repeat playthroughs

- Cheat codes accessible in-game via the Player’s GameCube

- Hard Mode (disabled by default), Soft Level Cap toggle (enabled by default), and more settings accessible by interacting with book on Player’s desk

name: Box Bop
description: Box Bop is a simple game where you just get to tinker and play with funny physics with boxes and spheres and stuff in a ball pit. Just made as a fun little tinker game...?

name: Dreamlike Love with Seira
description: Enjoy the memories with a beautiful maid in your dreams and heal your fatigue in reality.

name: Climbing with Silly Cat
description: Fun and difficult game about climbing with cute silly cat that rotate a lot! With 10 unlockable skins Game includes cute cat pictures! And you can meow!!!

name: Slash/Jump
description: How do you platform if walking and jumping aren't an option? With a sword of course! Bounce and slash your way through this short and sweet, uniquely controlled precision platformer!

name: Chasm
description: This game casts you as a spirited long-haired girl on an adventure in a room brimming with treasures and traps.

name: Dragon Clicker
description: Every click changes the color of your dragon, collect drops every 3 hours!

name: Pixel Retro Drift: Arcade Car Racing
description: Rediscover the golden era of arcade games, feel the adrenaline and joy of high-speed 80s racing!

name: Xenowars: Set Sail
description: This is a turn-based strategy/RPG game set in the stars. In the early stages, you will recruit a team of experts on Earth for exploring a distant alien homeworld, choosing between scientists, mutants, and soldiers. Scour the planet for lost alien technology and uncover the secrets to Earth’s doom.

name: Pure Golf
description: This immersive, relaxing 3D golf simulator lets you hone your skills on 6 stunning courses inspired by real-world locations. Set your tee time, choose your tee box, and play in a peaceful sunrise or test your skills in a thrilling thunderstorm! No gimmicks, no microtransactions – just golf.

name: Riftcast
description: A cyber companion for your desktop inspired by LCD virtual pets of old. Collect, train and fight all sorts of Reverians as you take on daring ventures, fun mini-games and fierce battles.

name: Long Yard Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Athralis Tower Defense
description: Defend humanity from the Athral Vanguard in Athralis Tower Defense. As the S.O.D.S. Commander, deploy manned turrets and advanced equipment from orbit to stop alien invasions. Experience intense sci-fi tower defense action and strategic gameplay.

name: Split Spirit
description: Immerse yourself in a vibrant world overflowing with color and charm as you traverse mountainous woodlands to rejoin with your other half. Seek the aid of the forest as flowers and deer pick you up and carry you along on your journey.

name: Lord
description: This game will transport you to a refreshing and comfortable gaming world where

name: Macabre no Zantou: Remnants of the Macabre
description: Navigate 1980s Japan as a schoolgirl in this Junji Ito-inspired horror game. Each choice shapes your fate, leading to safety or deeper into the macabre. Uncover hidden horrors in an urban street filled with sinister details. Will you find your way home, or be consumed by the unknown?

name: Sushi Ou
description: "Sushi Ou" is a mahjong-style board game where you can play against up to three people online.Become a [Sushi Chef], a craftsman who loves sushiAim for the top of sushi with unique characters!The player who collects two pieces of sushi before the other players wins.

name: Fishlike
description: High speed microgames involving fish, fishing, and fishlike activities.

name: Doll Grabber
description: "Doll Grabber" is a casual puzzle game that simulates a claw machine. Players need to grab a specified number of dolls in each level. Come and challenge yourself!

name: Liminal Void
description: This is a survival horror dungeon crawler in which you snatch souls, cast spells, and die repeatedly. Through death, you reach Liminal Layer 444: the lair of the Void Gods. Humanity requires them to be erased from existence to prevent another apocalypse.

name: Manludo
description: Play rock, paper, scissors to get off an alien space station. Esperanto: Vi devas ludi papero, tondilo, ŝtono por forlasi eksterteran kosmostacion.

name: Harlot's Diary
description: In a ruthless world where you've lost everything, only desperate measures remain. Fight to survive as a sex worker and reach the top, avoiding deceit, murderers, and abuse on your path to success.

name: Dodge Barrage
description: Dodge Barrage is a chaotic sports-fighting game, where you’ll need quick reflexes and aggressive plays to take down your opponents. Play with up to four players either locally or online.

name: Minigames Mayhem
description: Minigames Mayhem is a fun collection of minigames, that can bring joy for players not only in single-player but also with friends in your living room or across vast distances. Try to beat the high scores, compete with others, and bring mayhem on other players in many simple but fun games!

name: Galaxy Burger
description: A cozy cooking simulator. Cook food for robo-kitties, aliens, and other strangers. Craft juicy burgers, fry fries, and make drinks! Play in co-op with friends ‍‍ or alone. Expand your space burger shop and travel the galaxy.

name: The Intertwined Imprints
description: "The Intertwined Imprints" is a yuri visual novel that tells a story about youth, growth, and love. Due to an accident, Mei Yu was temporarily brought back to the village where she spent her childhood. She didn't think it was a good idea, but... she didn't feel like she had much of a choice.

name: Rent A Car Simulator 24
description: Rent A Car Simulator. Start by renting your first car. Expand your rental car fleet by purchasing different vehicles and grow your car rental business. Drive your cars and get them fixed when they break down. Find new customers. Build and improve your rent a car office.

name: Asteroid Core
description: You are isolated on a small meteor and need to build a fire to escape before being destroyed by aliens. Use your limited space to create machines and obtain more and more resources. Enjoy this mix of puzzles, tower defense and incremental gameplay.

name: Multiplication Mayhem
description: An educational adventure to learning multiplication! Choose the right platform with the product of the multiplication or fall to the depts. Save animals with each multiplication table completed and use their buffs to your advantage. Experience the visual novel like story to save the realm.

name: Mizi No!
description: In this free 2D puzzle game, you must reassemble broken objects that your cat has knocked over.

name: Ominous
description: Ominous is a thriller/horror game for up to 4 players. In this game, you must collaborate with your teammates to face a creature within an indoor setting. What sets Ominous apart is its unique approach to multiplayer, offering a distinct experience compared to many other horror games available.

name: Soviet Project
description: Explore an abandoned city and solve puzzles in a unique open world horror adventure.

name: Fwog
description: Frogs don't walk, and neither do fwogs! Hop, jump and swing your way through each stage in this unforgiving 2D-platformer. Be prepared to fall again and again and again as you slowly learn what it takes to fwog.

name: Harem! Ranch Life
description: This is a relaxing farm RPG game where you can earn money by collecting and raising livestock! Interact with adorable villagers to increase your popularity in the village through chatting and giving gifts. Please enjoy a cozy farm life in this small village!

name: Project Colored Mountains
description: Project Colored Mountains is a 3D platformer game about a tiny little robot bouncing around a field (and a school, and a comically large grocery store...). Leap through a simulation and into real life while upgrading your abilities as well as defying the laws of physics. We really don't understand how this thing can bounce, stretch out and then jump again in midair. Also, you can roll around or something. Discover what those funny looking block things do, what those other funny block things do, and what those transparent funny block things do.

name: Selene's Unbearable Night
description: A third person survival horror game. Search for key objects, solve puzzles and face dangers in order to escape. Inspired by the old survival horror, with two playable characters and modern mechanics delve into the narrative story of Selene's Unbearable night.

name: Concord
description: In Concord, you play as the crew of the Northstar—a group of guns-for-hire known in our galaxy as Freegunners. The Freegunners roam the stars taking high-stakes jobs on worlds across Wild space, where they face other fiercely competitive Freegunner crews. From match-to-match, you’ll form your team of Freegunners with other players and battle it out with rival crews to take home the reward across a variety of maps and modes.

name: Iron Diamond
description: Explore the mysterious land of Kindara in this light-hearted 2D Metroidvania. Find new abilities and weapons and use them to jump, punch and shoot through various obstacles in this non-linear platformer. Adventure awaits!

name: Project Zero
description: Project Zero is an free-to-play multiplayer first-person shooter developed by only one person at the moment.

name: The Eightfold Path
description: The path of a Buddhist monk is a path of enlighenment. Find your way through the mystical forest and encounter beautiful creatures, magical places, evil spirits and puzzling challenges which you will have to complete in order to be released from suffering.

name: Pair Horror + Haunted Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Wakka Follow the Treasure Ring
description: The controls are really simple, so don't worry! To raise the spaceship, just press the button. When you release it, gravity will pull the spaceship down. Collect "wakka" while avoiding walls and obstacles.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Fatso
description: The beloved, rotund brother of Chubby, Fatso makes short work of invasions so he can get back to feasting on human delicacies. Fatso is a special character skin for the Tank Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Medieval Fantasy: Jigsaw Puzzle - Funny Moments

description: Defend against advancing enemies in a broken tank! Experience the impossible battle on WWII’s front lines. Survive with limited supplies in intense tank warfare!

name: Minefield Combat
description:
Enter the battlefield of Minefield Combat, an intense and strategic tower defense game where quick thinking and precision are your keys to survival. As waves of relentless enemies advance, you must strategically place and upgrade your mortar towers to protect your territory.

Immerse yourself in the fast-paced action with rapid consumption gameplay that keeps you on the edge of your seat. Each mortar tower boasts unique attack patterns and abilities, allowing for endless strategic combinations. Earn and manage your resources wisely to upgrade your defenses and adapt to the ever-increasing challenge.

Navigate through meticulously designed mid-poly warfare-themed environments, from war-torn landscapes to fortified trenches. Each level presents a new battlefield with its own strategic elements, ensuring no two battles are the same.

Whether you're a casual gamer or a strategic mastermind, Minefield Combat offers a thrilling and engaging defense experience for all. Prepare your defenses, upgrade your towers, and become the ultimate defender in Minefield Combat.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Additional character pack vol.3 "Riko & Mari + Yohane"

1. Added playable character "Riko, Mari"
2. New story "Riko, Mari"
3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Lily, Nightwicked Mari, Fledgling Yohane"
4. New summoning card "Mirage Shield"
5. Yohane's new costume "Astrologer"

description:
"THE NINJA KIDS" is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Our ninja-doll heroes must battle to save their town from the evildoers who are plotting to resurrect a great evil.
Take control of one of 4 characters, who might look similar, but are as individual as they are colourful, and slice and dice your enemies with justice in your heart, and ninja magic at your fingertips!

description: Unleash your office rage—one swing at a time!

name: Rise Eterna Bundle
description: This bundle contains Rise Eterna & Rise Eterna War

name: Rubber Head Bob
description: It's a mountain climbing game with a rubber-headed human! The controls are incredibly challenging! Bounce around like crazy!

name: Gourmet
description: An unfortunate adventure game about an apocalypse, and apartment building, and its murderous, cannibalistic landlord. Find hidden items to help your neighbors, seek a way to escape the apartment building, and discover four unique endings based on your choices!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator: World Update 18
description: World Update XVIII provides pilots the highest resolution yet for the stunning scenery of Germany, Austria, and Switzerland.

name: Peach
description: In this world, simply being near or gently tapping one of my peaches ensures a fresh delivery to your Steam Inventory every 30 minutes. Embrace this future, and taste the excellence of natures blessing.
