description:
The Freshman, Book 2 is the second book of The Freshman series.

In this book, your character starts the winter quarter of her freshman year at Hartfeld, as she deals with old problems, new projects, and her one true love...

name: Sky Airplane Racer: Flight & Fight Simulator
description: Welcome to the exciting world of air plane racing, where speed and strategy are everything!

name: Ring Sculptors
description: A gripping text-based narrative adventure set in a dystopian future where your choices truly matter.

name: Project Kyzen
description:
Project Kyzen is a casual, multiplayer game in which players will have the choice to compete against each other in several different mini-games. Users can craft
unique avatars and explore the Kyzen universe.

Project Kyzen will be developed in phases throughout its lifetime in which players will be able to provide feedback to create the ultimate immersive experience in gaming.

name: Alice's Hanny Hanny Crush!
description: Alice's Hanny Hanny Crush! is a casual Hack & Slash game featuring satisfying Hanny crushing!Please show no sympathy. Afterall, they are just ceramics. Share your results on social media to show off your Hanny crushing skills!

name: Forever World Cup Simulator
description: The simulator lets you select 50+ tournaments at the same time, including EURO, World Cup, Nations Leagues, and AFCON. Its unique "forever" feature allows simulations to run indefinitely, with 220+ national teams' attributes evolving dynamically. You can create new teams with a powerful editor.

name: Balocks
description: Balocks is a casual arcade game made for people that enjoy arrenging pieces without leaving spaces with a twist, you move all the pieces at the same time!

name: Gourds Up
description: Gourds up is a 2D shooter, with many roguelike-y elements. You will progress through runs by choosing the next rooms, through the form of cards, that you will fight in, allowing for more strategy during the run. Get random weapons and upgrades, and just don't die!

name: Roswell Ranch
description: Howdy, stranger! Hide from a vigilant UFO, find weapon components, and protect the farm from malevolent extraterrestrial threats.

name: Colorizing
description: Coloring by numbers game for relaxation

name: Paris in 2000 Years
description: 'Paris in 2000 Years' is a city-builder game focused on the history of Paris. From the Gallo-Roman era to the Middle Ages and the Renaissance, you can construct, upgrade, and beautify various buildings. Completing historical quests will also reward you with iconic landmark architectures.

name: Language Learning Simulator: Alphabet
description: Language Learning Simulator - Alphabet is an educational game that allows players to learn new alphabets easily and in a fun way!

name: Extreme Climbing Mirage City
description: Explore exciting climbing tracks in the Baghdad desert with assassin characters in Extreme Climbing Mirage City! This game, full of realistic graphics and challenging missions, increases the adrenaline rush. Start climbing now and write your legend!

name: Merge Marbles
description: Merge Marbles is a relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to merge as many pairs of the same coloured marbles as you can. Each time you merge a pair it creates the next tier all the way up to the big pink marble. Try your best to merge the pink marble to clear as much space as you can!

name: Puzzle Dungeon!!: Earthmage Erin
description:
Puzzle Dungeon!! is a series of games where fantasy classes solve puzzles themed after their abilities!

In Puzzle Dungeon!!: Earthmage Erin, play as Erin, an Earthmage with the power to control gravity. Solve 30+ puzzles in themed dungeons to rescue Erin's lost goats and bring them back to her farm.

name: Tunnel Escape
description: Embark on a journey to save humankind as you kick, shoot and loot your way out of a secret underground laboratory in this rogue-lite exploration RPG/ADV with strategic, turn-based combat.

name: SwayBods: Physics Puzzle Game
description: In this physics puzzle game, tap the bubble monsters to move them in a pendulum like swaying movement along the arc. Time the taps carefully so that the monsters do not bump into each other. Get all the monsters in a level swinging to complete the level.

name: Alien Paradise
description: A rhythm game where you help an alien to have the best vacation on Planet Earth

name: Rise Eterna War
description: Rise Eterna War tells the bloody tale of Arthbane, a great general who led the last stand to reclaim his homeland Ars Rare from foreign invaders. Play as Arthbane, 10 years before the events of Rise Eterna, rallying loyalists in a desperate bid to seize the capital Gaiacus.

name: Ducks in a Row
description: Help Mama Duck navigate parks, factories, and more in this super cute puzzler, and bring all her baby ducks home!

name: PlatinumS
description: PlatinumS is a roguelite top-down arena shooter that brings the ultimate hero's party-building experience to life, empowering heroes to conquer dungeons. Players have the option to select from a range of items and buffs to craft their own distinctive builds.

name: Japanese Milf
description: Welcome to the Japanese Milf game, it is a game for adults created for virtual reality.

name: Tiebreak
description: The official ATP and WTA Tennis game has finally arrived! Become the Number One player in the world, competing for entire seasons against the largest cast of professional tennis players ever united in a tennis videogame.

name: Orc Covenant
description: Gorgeously illustrated with hundreds of images, Orc Covenant is a sextacular romp into a fantasy realm full of sultry elves and beefy well-endowed orcs!

name: When the Devil Takes Hold
description: When The Devil Takes Hold promises to be a bone-chilling journey into the heart of fear, with immersive first-person gameplay, a deep storyline, and a heart-pumping atmosphere.

name: Don't Bow
description: Old school shooter. Gibs give you ammo, going Berserk gives you health. Kill them all.

name: Periphery Synthetic
description: Explore a planetary system, synthesize new abilities, and reveal its past. This interactive EP offers a chill and non-violent metroidvania experience across procedurally-generated musical playgrounds.

name: Finding Mosey
description: Find your cat Mosey, choosing your degree of destruction and dedication. Fight, sneak, or talk your way into new areas and upgrade your character along the way as the search gets messy. Loot ridiculous items and discover hidden stories that help you explore this open world.

name: Selatria
description: Follow the story of Mage and Melanie as their home, Availia, is threatened by an invading imperial army. These two soon find themselves on the run, recruiting friends in unlikely places to protect their home… and eventually the world.

name: Wild West Dynasty
description: Wild West Dynasty: Cowboys, Settlers & Gunslingers! Build your own ranch, provide food and wealth and soon more settlers will join you in your quest for happiness. Will you manage to build a "Wild West Dynasty" or will you end up on the gallows?

name: 3 Minutes to Midnight
description: 3 Minutes to Midnight is Scarecrow Studio ’s first adventure game with its development led by Jan Serra It is a classic point-and-click adventure game telling the story of Betty Anderson. Do you love unexpected stories and puzzling twists, as well as the feeling of satisfaction that comes when you solve riddles – the harder they are the better? You can’t stop laughing at funny dialogues? You can’t get enough of the "give me more" feeling after you discover the last clue? Then you will love this game! Move around beautifully drawn 2D scenes full of details. Experience a very personal, complex, and interactive story driven by exploration and puzzle-solving. Meet the peculiar characters of this game, and find out about their background stories. Furthermore, there are multiple Easter eggs hidden in the game. Can you spot them all?

name: Tactical Breach Wizards
description: Tactical Breach Wizards is a small-scale, turn-based tactics game where you play a team of wizards in modern-day tactical gear, breaching and clearing rooms full of armed hostiles by making clever use of interesting spells.

name: Golly Soda Pop
description: A Brazilian soda brand that existed from the 40s until the 60s, closed its doors after a macabre incident... Nowadays, an urban legend circulates that says a creature roams the abandoned bottling factory's corridors. May God help the poor soul who dares to enter this place...

name: AAA Clock: Extreme Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Vterm ATC Simulator
description: vTERM: Your ultimate ATC radar simulator! Command a fictional airport with a 27/09 runway layout. Navigate realistic scenarios with precision using the STARS scope interface.

name: Trainz 2019: BR General Utility Van Pack 1
description: The General Utility Vans were a series of bogie vans built by British Railways used for transporting parcels mail, vehicle and other goods. These were used over the entire British railways with some still remaining in service with Network Rail. This pack includes Green, Red, Maroon, and Maroon Lined

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train - Altoona Works
description: This route features ‘Altoona Works' and it (also known as Altoona Terminal) is a large railroad industrial complex in Altoona, Pennsylvania. 10 new locomotives are included.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Dapper Delights
description: The 12th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings Tiana (from Disney's Princess and the Frog) to the Valley, a new restaurant building, a new Stall for buying prepared meals, the Dapper Delights Star Path and general quality of life improvements.

name: MyTeardrop
description: Take care of your awesome little Teardrop. You could also just feed her lemons for her entire life! All that matters is that you're now Teardrop's best friend.

name: Auto Pirates: Captains Cup
description:
Competitive daily pirate auto-battler. Choose your crew and compete globally.
Auto Pirates is a competitive player vs world strategy game where you choose your crew, equip your ship and battle, earning loot based on your global rank. There is no pay-to-win or grind-to-win, new players can challenge for the top if their strategies are good enough.

name: GP Club Life Motorsports Team
description: Sin descripción

name: White Eternal
description: There's something hiding in the cold of winter. What made your friend disappear? Snow's begun to fall. Let's just wait a little bit longer.

name: Zoo-ika
description: A suika-like where you merge animals and go for the high score! It also features a low gravity mode.

name: Diner Out
description: Merge matching kitchen ingredients to cook delicious dishes and keep hungry customers happy in this cozy game. Turn your café into the talk of the town!

name: Chronicon: Survivors
description: Fight a mix of familiar and new dangerous foes in this fast paced horde survival game! Upgrade your weapons, unlock new items & characters, advance in the permanent passive skill tree, and try to survive the horde! Based off the ARPG Chronicon by the same developer.

name: Dance Maniax 2ndMIX append JPARADISE
description: This was the first and only append game in the Dance Maniax series, and the last game in the series altogether.

name: Rivals with Benefits
description: Rivals with Benefits is the second book of the Roommates with Benefits series. It succeeds its first book, Roommates with Benefits.

name: Fighting Fantasy Classics: Armies of Death
description: Agglax the Shadow Demon is amassing an army of undead warriors to conquer Allansia. Can YOU defeat the nightmare horde of undead? Rally your troops and join a quest to seek out the special powers you will need to defeat the dark lord!

name: Kour 64
description: KOUR 64 is a goofy 1st-Person Parkour platformer, inspired by Collectathon games from the late 90's. Explore a wacky dream world using a dreamlike depiction of parkour, meet funny characters and grab a bunch of loot in this short adventure.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Dragons
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Dragons - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Organ Game: Merge Puzzle
description: When you hit the same organ, the organ will “evolve”! Evolve organs more and more to get bigger organs! The goal of the game is to get a high score so that the organs do not overflow from the beaker. Aim for the first place in the score ranking!

name: Mangavania 2
description: Old school action platformer game with pixel art graphics.

name: Esoterica Order
description: Drop in take on the challenge, in this third person shooter. The odds will be against you and continue to not be in your favor. Good luck Phantom.

name: Wedding Day
description: As I reached adulthood, a village bully murdered me and abandoned my body in a temple. My fearful parents didn't seek revenge but, worried about my wandering spirit, arranged a ghostly marriage. This allowed me to rest peacefully in a suitor's ancestral tomb.

name: Hour of Survival: Zombie Craft
description: Navigate a post-apocalyptic world, where every decision can mean life or death. Scavenge for food, water, and supplies to keep your character alive in the face of constant danger.

name: Naive Boy Super Lash
description: Do you like whips? Have you ever wanted an accurate, next-generation, stimulating whip simulator? Well, this game is far from it, but at least it tries!

name: The History of Magic Tower: Opening
description: "The History of Magic Tower: Opening" is a fantasy adventure game based on the "Magic Tower" game mode. This work is set against the backdrop of various traditional magical tower worldviews and tells the story of events that occurred before the time point of the classic game "50-layer Magic Tower".

name: Wheel Riders
description: Sin descripción

name: Moonshine Madness
description: A competitive 8 player racing game which contains items that can be used as well as interactive objects and randomized map events. The game has online matchmaking and custom lobbies so no worries! You will always find someone to play with!

name: The Aching Aversion
description: A 3D RPGMaker Horror game about exploring a weird bunker. The bunker will have different horrors waiting in it depending on how you broke into it! 7 different routes to 9 unique endings! An ending collecting game!

name: Blunted in The Malen
description: Join the individual story of Sharp, a revolutionary living in the corrupt city of Malen. Solve various puzzles with 2.5D visuals, uncover the mysteries of the locations, and untangle the knots in the story.

name: The Violinist
description: If you love the violin, classical music, or any instrument, this vertical rhythm game is for you.Rosin up your bow, tune your violin, and launch yourself into musical success.

name: Floops Big House Adventure
description: Shoot, loot, and toot your way through 90's cartoon inspired Floops Big House Adventure! Floops is a wave based roguelike arcade game. Learn enemy attacks and upgrade combinations in order to take down the Monster Overlord!

name: G9: League of Aces
description: In G9: League of Aces, heroes have personalized skills, allowing players to choose combinations based on preference. Three modes offer diverse gameplay: 5 vs 5, A.R.A.M., and the original Crazy Carnival Battle Park. From high-tech enhanced heroes to superhumans and aliens, all compete for glory!

name: Dr. Planet
description: Create mini planets and civilizations. Let them flourish, or let them fall - literally. The choice is yours, Doctor Planet.

name: StoicScape
description: Recruited by a mysterious wanderer named Marcus Aurelius, you will embark upon a series of "Stoic Trials," where you will gather philosophical insights for his unfinished book, "Meditations." Extract resources, defeat enemies, and confront epic bosses to become a master stoic.

name: TDS
description: TDS - Tower ▪ Defense ▪ Strategy. Control Vessels. Utilize their uniquely deep, yet simple set of towers. Create an everchanging defense. Protect your Basin at all costs. A Tower Defense, Real-Time Strategy Hybrid

name: Veiled Skies
description: Veiled Skies is a "cloudpunk" jRPG that serves as a cornerstone for the Kuroverse, a series of games set in a vast world covering three skydoms. Takes heavy inspiration from Granblue Fantasy.

name: Cat Fantasy
description: A cyberpunk, anime-style 3D turn-based RPG, where cats transform into anime girls.

name: Type Your Fate
description: Type your fate. Arm yourself with your keyboard and your wits, and try to escape from the abandoned house where you are. Unfortunately, you won't be alone...

name: Office Fight
description: Laid off by Mega-corp, you're literally dead. As a ghost, possess office equipment, cause chaos, and ignite epic ragdoll brawls among coworkers for revenge. Office Fight: Work sucks, break stuff!

name: Who is Abby
description: You play as Tom, searching for his missing sister in this stunning first-person walking sim meets point-and-click adventure. A psychological thriller where you unravel a mystery through exploration and puzzle-solving—no horror, just suspense and intrigue as you reveal more about her disappearance.

name: My Lovely Empress
description: My Lovely Empress is a empire management sim inspired by Asian mythology. As the Emperor of the Crimson Empire, you will build relations with neighboring rulers, balance internal factions, and ensure the prosperity of your people, all before you reap their souls to resurrect your beloved empress.

name: Tenko
description: Step into a world above the clouds as you assume the role of Rina Seiko, a former revolutionary warrior... and the infamous "White Demon" of legend who once made blood rain. Can she make amends with her past... or will her "Hitokiri" persona surface and lead the skies to ruin?

name: Never Forgotten
description: A uniquely stylised survival-horror adventure game. Explore a dying world, navigating through hazards and solving puzzles by deciphering riddles and combining items.

name: NightFall Hollow
description:
Nightfall Hollow is a rich story driven game with a paranormal edge. Your choices matter in this game, Residents will remember your dialogue choices and they 'MAY' help you with your investigation or ignore you - depending on what you do! and what you find along the way!

A lot of love has gone in to the lore of Nightfall Hollow, and we hope you enjoy discovering it

name: Bash Sports Online Bowling
description: BASH GAMING STUDIO PRESENTS: BASH SPORTS ONLINE BOWLING! PLAY HEAD TO HEAD WITH YOUR ONLINE FRIENDS, or practice at home! 8 player online game play, multiple characters to choose from and some secrets that will BLOW YOU AWAY! Do you have what it takes to join the SPARTA CLUB??? See you ONLINE!

name: Space Ranger Appleseed
description: Become a Space Ranger, guarding a Space Orchard. Fly across asteroid belts, drive across dusty moonscapes & liase with the Space station to get your bumper crop of space apples ready!

name: Rivalry warlord Sengoku
description: A turn-based Sengoku simulation game that can be played by vassal!

name: QuietMansion1
description: Explore a dark and creepy mansion crawling with terrifying monsters, find keys, and use weapons to fight back as you try to find your way out!

name: Stick Frame
description: Stick Frame is a mini platformer/metroidvania game, where you navigate the world using weirds abilities you find along the way.

name: Train Sim World 5: Linke Rheinstrecke - Mainz - Koblenz Route Add-On
description: Wind the clock back to the 1990s and experience the flagship of the Deutsche Bundesbahn; be enveloped by stunning Rheinland countryside, from the shimmering river to castle-topped hills, and serve historical towns in style with Train Sim World 3: Linke Rheinstrecke: Mainz - Koblenz!

name: Train Sim World 5: East Coast Main Line - Peterborough - Doncaster Route Add-On
description: Feel the high-speed thrill of British inter-city travel in Train Sim World 4! Express services await on the iconic East Coast Main Line, hurry between Peterborough and Doncaster, and through the English countryside, in the sleek and flashy LNER Azuma.

name: Train Sim World 5: Antelope Valley Line - Los Angeles - Lancaster Route Add-On
description: Experience the hefty power of modern American diesel! Tackle the tough terrain of Californian canyons with the Antelope Valley Line, between the sprawling Los Angeles cityscape and desert bushes of Lancaster in almighty Metrolink traction.

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pent's Zacky, Zany Road Trip to Adulthood
description:
Since the dawn of Pentagon, the five-sides ones achieve full adulthood by driving the famed 'Most Dangerous Road in the World'. Today, destiny calls out to our bored protagonist Pent to fullfill this Herculean task.

Explore a big world of unyielding nonsense that simply refuses to take itself seriously at any point. Earn money by completing wild races, taking pictures of strange phenomena (and appease the Government) or by just finding it on the ground in some ditch. There are also some puzzles, I suppose.

name: Walled City Sunset
description:
Welcome to Walled City!

You work here as an industrial climber. Fix AC units, talk to people, find lost cats, connect buildings and dream to witness the sunset at the top of the city.

name: Grow to Perfection
description: Sin descripción

name: The Pocket Master
description:
As the Pocket Master, you job is to help people in need.

Use your magical pocket to change objects size and please everyone!

Pocket everything! Objects, people, entire rooms... The pocket world has no limit.

name: Wardens of Romance
description: Sin descripción

name: Inti Creates Gold Archive Collection
description:
From the 8-bit generation. For the 8-bit generation!

This game is reminiscent of the 80s, not just in looks, but also with simple controls that create a surprising amount of complexity and fun.

Accompanying Gunvolt in this adventure are the angel Ekoro from Gal☆Gun and Beck from Mighty Number 9. Each character possesses different skills that will force the player to finish each stage in different and creative ways.

name: Hole-y Golf
description: Control the size of the hole (aka cup, target) in golf from underground to help your dad win matches. Don't be too suspicious or you'll get caught.

name: Scaling the Scale
description: Using the axe you forged using a timber you won from a scaling (estimating timber) contest and the sharpest fish scale you could find, you must scale (climb up) the scale (South African term for a large alcohol container).

name: Train Sim World 5: LGV Mediterranee - Marseille: Avignon Route
description: Experience the excitement of high-speed rail, aboard the iconic TGV Duplex, through sun-soaked Southern France with Train Sim World: LGV Méditerranée.

name: Pixadom
description: Pixadom is a cozy 2D top-down social MMORPG with a charming pixel art style, playable directly in your browser on any modern device. Set in a vibrant world designed for social interaction, Pixadom blends the nostalgia of classic games with a fresh, community-driven experience. Players can enjoy a variety of activities, explore a richly detailed world, and participate in regular events. With a focus on community and creativity, Pixadom offers a unique, engaging multiplayer adventure that evolves through weekly updates and player-driven content.

name: TimeSplitters: Future Perfect
description: The PS2 version of the "TimeSplitters: Future Perfect" was added to the PlayStation Plus game catalog on August 20th, 2024 for PS Plus Premium members on PS4 & PS5.

name: TimeSplitters
description: Sin descripción

name: TimeSplitters 2
description: The PS2 version of "TimeSplitters 2" was added to the PlayStation Plus game catalog for PS4 & PS5 on August 20th, 2024 for PS Plus Premium members.

name: Designed to Climb
description: The mineshaft you were working in has started to flood with lava, time to make your escape! You'll have to use your massive robot to make your way up the mineshaft, but it wasn't really meant to be manned by a crew of just one... You need to keep all of its systems in working order if you're ever going to make it out.

name: Don't Pop The Balloon
description: You wake up in a strange room, with nothing but a cake in front of you. Your hands are locked, and your left hand is trapped under a hand guillotine on the table. Your task seems simple: blow up the balloon. But be careful, not popping the balloon might be the only way to survive.

name: Proportionator
description:
Embark on a quest to steal the Proportionator from a top-secret facility in this short, 8-bit-styled platformer!

Proportionator features a sleazy little guy called Paavo, just scooting around town, when he hears of a high-tech device by Vicinity Industries that can shrink and expand objects at will. After snatching it, you'll have to help him escape the compound by resizing almost any objects around you. Are you built to scale this challenge?

Proportionator is an 8-bit-styled side-scrolling platformer featuring a total of five levels across different biomes, dozens of different interactable objects, as well as a unique soundtrack by Francca. The game was developed over the course of four days (96 hours) for the GMTK Game Jam 2024.

name: Fortnite: Band Flair Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Blueprint Hell
description: Does your code have enough scalability?

name: Friendly Fire
description: Sin descripción

name: Something Is Wrong With My World Map
description:
"Something is wrong with my World Map" is a puzzle game, where you need to play with various sizes in the world map in order to create the right path to continue.

Switch size by exiting a village on a different side, or even by simply opening the map!

Step on a mountain to flatten it, or switch to the small size to enter caves!

Will you "step up" to the challenge?

name: Tiny Technologies
description:
Think with scaling! Resize object and yourself in order to navigate through 8 puzzle levels.
The game was inspired by Portal and Talos Principle and created as part of the GMTK 2024 game jam

name: Las gafas nuevas del yayo Carmelo
description:
Josemi's grandfather has been fitted with new glasses that make his eyes huge and, apparently, these glasses allow him to see far away.
A very short interactive fiction about a summer afternoon between a grandfather and a grandson.

name: Animals
description: Animals is an engaging clicker game where every click counts. Explore unique habitats like Aerial, Arboreal, Terrestrial, and Aquatic, and collect diverse animals. Earn regular and rare drops influenced by your click activity. Join our community to help shape the game and build a vast metaverse.

name: A Shrimpful Adventure
description:
A Shrimpful Adventure is a free short 2D puzzle-platformer developed in under four days for GMTK 2024 by a small team with minimal game development experience.

"Two shrimps, a father and a child, embark on an adventure in search of treasure."

name: Starfield: Rev-8
description:
This update added the REV-8 land vehicle, available after installing a vehicle module. It is an armored vehicle with a mounted turret and boosters that will be automatically deployed outside your ship wherever you land.

Along with the general fixes and improvements for the game, this update also included new Xbox Series S display settings to mirror the existing Xbox Series X settings with frame rate targets, Visual or Performance priority options and a VSync toggle.

name: Multiplayer Shooters
description: Multiplayer Shooters - A fast paced shooter game with lots of different game modes and weapons

name: Cursed House 5
description: An advanced Match 3 Puzzle game

name: Overwatch 2: Season 12 - New Frontiers
description: Blast into action with Juno, the new Martian support hero, an intense Clash game mode featuring two new maps, divine mythic skins, and more.

name: Truck Simulator 2024: USA Driver Zone - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Stumble Guys: Founder's Pack Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Heart of Squid
description: Returning from vacation, he finds that the island has been invaded by workers who plan to cut down all the trees and blow up the island. Not agreeing with this decision, Grandpa decides to engage in an unequal battle to defend his home.

name: Cat Fusion Quest
description: Dive into the enchanting world of Cat Fusion Quest, a delightful and addictive puzzle game where the goal is to combine adorable cats to create even more charming and powerful feline friends!

name: Escape From Warehouse
description: The journalist goes to the warehouse to record a documentary, but becomes a witness to creepy stories. The guards and warehouse workers look very strange. What is really hidden behind the endless shelves and how not to become a victim of the warehouse?

name: Gentle Officer
description: Take on the role of an officer into whose hands an indomitable spy has fallen. Expose the Agent by any legal or illegal means.

name: Smashing Simulator Idle
description: Incremental game about smashing with unfolding gameplay and two prestige layers.

name: Szikra
description: A relaxing, 2.5D side-scrolling short game set in a unique steampunk/fantasy environment. Find your way through vast fields, magical forests, and giant gears in a steaming factory to reach the twisted circus where your friend is locked up. Jump, find switches, push boxes around to get there.

name: Can't Revert
description: Can't revert is a first-person psychological horror game. You repeatedly find yourself in a house where your wife and son are dead. Discover hidden clues in the house and uncover the secrets of their deaths. Experience the constant tension and fear in the repetitive space.

name: Stickers for You
description: This game was created for game streamers. It is nothing but pain. We do not recommend purchasing this game except for distributors. All you have to do is collect 100 stickers hidden in a closed city. But you probably won't be able to complete it alone.

name: Guild Wars 2: Janthir Wilds
description: Explore new lands, wield a spear in combat, and test yourself in challenging encounters in Guild Wars 2: Janthir Wilds. The newest adventure in the world of Tyria will play out over the course of four quarterly releases: a year of content, feature updates, and more.

name: Armadillo Assault
description: Armadillo Assault is an online multiplayer, action-platformer shooter, inspired by the glory days of couch multiplayer fun. Re-creating the magic of local multiplayer in an online environment, Armadillo Assault offers a unique experience for players looking to have a fun online PvP experience!

name: Arena Breakout: Infinite
description: Arena Breakout: Infinite is an ultra-real immersive military simulation. Join a fight to shoot, loot, and raid your path to fortune.

name: Elemental Exiles
description: Elemental Exiles is an RPG deckbuilding roguelike. Play as one of 12 heroes, each with their own personal quest, starting location and initial cards. Overcome challenging battles and adapt to unexpected narrative encounters as you grow your deck and explore.

name: Street of the Cats
description: Search and find cats in a relaxing hidden object game for cat's lovers. Can you find them all?

name: Haunted Arcade
description: A cozy Arcade Game Collection turned on its head by the twists of a local Ghost.

name: CatCat Save The World
description: This is RTS puzzle game. One holy girl in other world who call Yuna just complete the Hero Summon, but there has no hero coming from this summon, a cat just show up. That white cat call him as "CatCat" and his name is "GiFi", He steers up the mobile-human armor, and start to save the world.

name: Once Upon a Rogue's Tale
description: Embark on a journey through your favorite fairytales in this charming roguelike deckbuilding board game. Will you help Little Red Riding Hood find her grandmother or help the Frog Prince break his curse? How the story continues is up to you....

name: Seeing Things
description: SEEING THINGS is full tilt surveillance horror. Keep your eyes locked on security cameras for an outrageous collection of horrific anomalies, suspicious movement, and the occasional T-Rex. Observe, detect, survive!

name: Apacies: Creatures of the Old West
description: Apacies is a Turn Based Strategy game set in the Old West. Use the varied creatures found in the deputed land as your allies, as they are more powerful and reliable than bullets. The vast expanse of land is yours to explore, it's story yours to mold, and its history, yours to explore.

name: Space Tournament
description: Space Tournament is the ultimate destination for experiencing captivating drifts in a stunning 2D space environment.

name: Restaurant at the End of Time
description: You find yourselves at the end of time, but your determination to run a successful restaurant remains unwavering.

name: Amata
description: Rage across the mad realms of a dead god as Charlet, the immortal artificer. Explore a vast, arcane desolation wrought by hatred. Cleanse the twisted inhabitants of ancient, forgotten worlds. Help Charlet find a way home using her powerful and varied suite of combat and platforming abilities.

name: Sunset Hills
description: The player takes on the role of Nico, who travels by train to each city to visit his former comrades, encountering a variety of people and events on the journey, and gradually learning about different life through solving assorted puzzles along the way. As they reunite, they recall their past experiences in the war, unravelling the war and Nico’s past, and gradually revealing the true purpose of Nico’s journey.

name: Black Myth: Wukong
description: Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. The story is based on Journey to the West, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

name: Dustborn
description: Lead a band of misfits and outcasts on a perilous road trip across a Divided States of America, in a story-driven action-adventure about hope, friendship, love, robots — and the power of words.

name: Ash of Legends
description: Story coming soon. You build towers, place traps, and use weapons, to defend objectives from hordes of the evil empire. Includes native Oculus and Steam VR support.

name: Predecessor
description:
Inspired by the legacy of Paragon, built with love by the community, and powered by Unreal Engine 5, Predecessor is the ultimate fusion of shooter action and MOBA strategy.

With more than 30 Heroes to choose from, each with unique and devastating abilities such as shooting through walls, turning invisible and raining down rockets from above, there's more than one way to take down your opponents! Hit your lane and push the enemy objective, taking down towers as you battle to destroy their core all while protecting your own. Predecessor plays like a traditional three lane MOBA, but with genre-redefining elements such as an immersive third-person perspective, high quality graphics and game-changing map verticality.

name: Dance Eden
description: This is a multiplayer XR dance game . Immerse yourself in the music and the joy of dancing, all while getting a great workout. Additionally, you can explore a wide range of stylish outfits and personalized makeup options, and engage in real-time social interactions with others. Let's dance together, live together!

name: Puzzle Land
description: Puzzle Land is a remake of the gameboy game Daedalian opus also known as puzzle road in japan.

name: Under Your Moon
description:
You're entirely alone-- until you're not. Entirely out of place, entirely by surprise, a mysterious person appears in your apartment. The first person that you've seen in years-- and then they're gone again, just as quickly. It's undeniable that something is changing, and that is has to with this stranger--
And something tells you that you'll see them again.

name: Fire Emblem: Dream of Five - Definitive Edition
description:
Dream of Five was an FE7, FEditor-era hack made in the early 2010s by a team of teenagers with too much time on their hands. For years, it has remained dormant, collecting cobwebs as the hacking scene advances in leaps and bounds.

Until now.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Definitive
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Ultra Premium
description: Sin descripción

name: Odd Color Out
description: Sin descripción

name: Dustborn: The Vision Tour Bundle
description:
Get your hands on the Vision Tour Bundle to unlock the following digital content:
- Sherbet twirl hat
- EYE C U jacket
- Psycho Pete bat

name: Death Travelers
description: Sin descripción

name: Chicken Party: Animal Farm
description: Enjoy this charming graphic novel set on a magical and lively farm.The story follows the exciting adventures of Clara, a curious and intelligent hen, and her brave friends.

name: Tiebreak: Ace Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Payday 3: Houston Breakout Heist
description:
Houston is on trial for a slew of crimes, and Concord is lurking behind the scenes, waiting to snap him up the second the sentence is rendered.

Whether you sneak your way through and pass without trace, or smash your way through the judiciary system with your own brand of justice is your choice; either way, Houston has a problem, and it’s your job to solve it.

name: Payday 3: Houston Breakout Weapon Pack
description: Guns, guns, guns! The only thing better is guns that put out more bullets! Which is exactly what you get with the Houston Breakout Weapon Pack, three burstfire weapons slinging lead in 3-round bursts.

name: The Last Scaler
description: A Foddyvania, where you build yourself up from scrap, collect new abilities, and scale a sacred mountain.

name: Pedro
description: A cool clicker.

name: Payday 3: Chapter 3 - Houston Breakout
description:
Dallas found his brother, Houston, alive but not safe. On trial for a slew of charges, Houston is injured, about to be sentenced, and sent off to one of Concord’s private prisons, from which he’s bound never to reappear.

Whether you break him out silently or go in guns blazing is up to you, either way, we’re getting our man out.

name: Bendy: Studio Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Cells: The End Is Near
description: Dead Cells final new content update. It brings new mobs, weapons, mutations and biome effects all expanding on the curse mechanic, 40+ new head skins, almost 20 new legendary affixes, extra accessibility options and more.

name: Tree Eater
description: Embark on a journey to restore a magical portal by helping a female centaur regain her powers! This game contains fetish themes such as: ass expansion, breast expansion, centaur weight gain.

name: Devils Adventure
description: 2.5d Platformer where you control devil character. Mission to avoid traps and enemies and finish different levels and find skulls

name: Kingdom's Architect
description: A medieval fantasy tower defense strategy game.

name: Peach Clicker
description: You've clicked on so many bananas, but have you clicked on peaches? In Peach Clicker you smack a Peach to get even more Peaches! Every hour, you get a new peach! Come smack some peaches with us!

name: Typing Test
description: TypingTest – Fast and Exciting Typing Challenge Where speed and accuracy meet fun! Play solo or multiplayer, improve your typing skills, and compete with friends. Available in 13 languages with detailed stats to track your progress. Join the TypingTest community and become a typing master!

name: Neon Fever
description: Jump, slide and shoot! Kill a player or wipe the entire enemy team with your one-shot-no-scope-super-laser-aiming skills and use gadgets to your advantage, in a 5v5 arena shooter with dynamic game modes and fast paced movement mechanics. May the better team win!

name: Dynasty's Defender: The Scroll's Curse
description: Dynasty's Defender: The Scroll's Curse is a strategic bubble shooter game set in the Western Han Dynasty. Players assume the role of a great general battling a magic scroll-wielding assassin. Precision shooting will burst all magical bubbles to rescue the emperor and empress.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Brazil
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Brazil landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 3D Puzzle: Pizza Shop 1
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: S.X.E. Slider: Dungeons
description: A dungeon inspired sliding tile puzzle game featuring 25 gorgeous images with a fantasy theme.

name: Scary Horror
description: "Scary Horror" is an innovative game in the analog horror genre. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of an abandoned and cordoned off neighborhood, the only way out of which is to collect all the bottles along the way. Explore the city district and enjoy breakthrough graphics.

name: SGS Battle For: Shanghai
description: Fight the ‘Stalingrad on the Yangze’, as was sometimes called the Battle for Shanghai in 1937. Play as the Chinese willing to reclaim the whole city or as the Imperial Japanese forces in their counter-attack.

name: Bass Defense
description: Bass Defense combines musical rhythm-based gameplay with strategic elements. You must hit the correct buttons in time with the music to clear your NMYs who try to destroy your base, unless you save it with the help of your upgradable - defensive or offensive - power-ups or your sense of rhythm.

name: SOF: Enemy from the future
description: Lead the SOF squad and defend the world against alien invasion! Engage in thrilling turn-based battles and uncover the mysteries of enigmatic extraterrestrials. Your time has come – join the fight and safeguard our future!

name: Parse-O-Rhythm
description: Parse-O-Rhythm is a rhythm game about slashing errors in files to fix them. Slice and dice your way through files with nothing but the mouse and two buttons!

name: Let's Learn Xaad Kil
description: Let's Learn X̱aad Kíl (Alaskan dialect) is an interactive self-study program designed to help those curious about Haida and to help them be as familiarized as possible. It includes games, activities, and a picture glossary.

name: Endura
description: Follow the journey of ex-convict, Jack Jr as he traverse the broken realm of Yagra to finish vital deliveries by utilizing grappling mechanics akin to Spiderman but with guns and swords, and hunting down titans reminisce to Monster Hunter.

name: Better With A Friend
description: Better With A Friend is a collection of hand drawn mini-games that you can only play with somebody else on a Steam Deck.

name: The Spewnicorn
description: Build the ultimate deck of cards and wield it to defeat the Gatekeepers! A cute and colorful roguelike full of fantastical whimsy!

name: Project Dance
description: This is Project DANCE, a multiplayer XR dance game! You can dance in real-time with others in the game, fully enjoying the joy that music and dance bring.

name: Catamyst
description: Catamyst is an Action, Roguelike game where you craft and throw molecular potions at hordes of enemies.

name: Toilet Paper Please
description: In Toilet Paper, please! you are a Toilet Paper Roll who wants to collect all the pieces of toilet paper in the world. Face more the 100 levels in this classic but challenging avoid and collect game.

name: Jousting Manager
description: Jousting Manager allows you to play a sports management game from a new angle. Take control of a medieval jousting team and handle all aspects of the club as you compete to reach the top.

name: Starground
description: Starground is a top-down automation and roguelite experience. Enjoy a truly flexible experience. All progression trees are completely independent from each other. Spend all your time automating, dungeoning, or maybe a bit of both. There's no right way to play the game, and any path you take will let you win. If you want to play together, invite your friends to work on the same things, or divide and conquer each part of the game.

name: Aim Zen
description: Aim Zen combines classic aim training with musical innovation to elevate precision. Dive into an unparalleled FPS experience, designed for all skill levels, where rhythm and gameplay merge for an engaging challenge.

name: Charles: The Full Story
description: Expand 'Charles the Bee' with this DLC! Dive into new marsh and mountain areas, adding 6 extra dance battles and story content. Test your skills in the arcade's triple-threat mode with back-to-back battles. It's a buzzing adventure!

name: Infinity Castle Dungeon
description: Infinity Castle Dungeon is a game that combines Hardcore and Roguelike. You have only one life, an infinite castle where all battles and challenges take place in real time. The castle is generated procedurally so each journey will be unique.

name: Arena Kingdoms
description: Arena Kingdoms is a community battle game where Discord servers play together, compete, and represent their server's HOUSE in weekly Arena Tournaments.

name: Charles the Bee
description: Charles has always dreamed of one day becoming a master dancer. The only thing in his path? The cost! Charles must harvest pollen until he has defeated the biggest and baddest dancers around in the world. Can he be the very best? That no one ever was? Its up to you!

name: Chromatic Resonance
description: Bullet hell meets auto-shooter in this roguelike color-matcher where RGB itself is your weapon! The Maiden of Light has been captured by the forces of entropy. Six challenging bosses stand in your way and only you can save her!

name: Runes of Aereal
description: In this fast paced rogue-like deckbuilder you can roam the islands of the Aereal archipeligo in search of the 9 runes that grant immortality.

name: Lurch
description: Multiplayer horror game where you and your friends are hired to work on an old house. Only after the completion of the tasks at hand will you be permitted to leave.

name: Get to the Gate
description: GetToTheGate is a roguelike about a girl that needs to reach the Gate to the world of the living while being extremely scared of monsters. When her fear builds up, she loses her mana and runs to safety. Find a shortcut to bypass the enemies and explore the dungeon from a new location.

name: The Art of War: Card Game
description: Lead one of four factions of your choice and defeat all your opponents in fierce card battles with real players from all around the world. Destroy your enemies, reinforce the power of your empire, and comprehend “The Art of War”!

name: Neo Utopia Project
description:
Neo Utopia Project is an indie videogame being developed for Windows. It is an hybrid between an RPG and a puzzle-adventure game.

The graphical aspect of the game will be focused in 2D-art mixed with pixel-art, while the story and gameplay will have dark undertones and a clear objective: To unravel the mysteries hidden in the living prison "Neo-Babylon" while the protagonists fight not only for their lives, but also to uncover the mysteries that this place holds.

The game is planned to be released in two languages: English and Spanish.

name: Portobugia
description: Portobugia is a management/survival game where you manage a port and you must supply a city with goods and food. To do so you must unload boats, but, be careful, some of them could be infected!

name: In Woods
description: In Woods is a roguelike survival game. Each battle require player to level up the character, collect different magic item, survive for a certain time and defeat the final boss.

name: Hailing from the Abyss
description: Hailing From the Abyss is a rhythm game with a unique duel setup. Beat powerful enemies in rhythmic battles by using consumables, acquiring power-ups, and skill. Guide Suri while she faces her past memories in style and rhythm!

name: Terminus: Zombie Survivors
description: Terminus: Zombie Survivors is a 2D turn-based survival roguelike set during a zombie apocalypse. Each journey is unique, and every decision can mean the difference between life and death. Can you brave hunger, cold and the undead in order to reach the Terminus and find salvation?

name: Chasing Sunsets
description:
Follow the story of a young man returning home after years abroad, suddenly faced with the prospect of shouldering life-changing responsibility and stirring the embers of a repressed childhood love.

This sprawling tale will take you from the Boston suburbs to Russia, Sicily, Tunisia, and the fictional island nation of Tonalu, where you will cooperate (or compete) with your estranged sister to fulfill your parents' final wishes.

Against the backdrop of a looming lawsuit, a landmark medical breakthrough, and the sudden appearance of a beautiful and quirky investigative reporter with a keen interest in your family, you will make the choices and cultivate the relationships that will determine what kind of man you become...And what kind of woman you want by your side.

Experience an emotional adventure where choices matter, and branching paths lead to at least eight possible unique endings. And don't forget to enjoy the sexy company along the way!

name: Ninety Thousand Acres
description:
Use your strategic mind in relaxing gameplay!
How many acres of land can you develop from 1 acre?

name: YAPG
description:
Refill your batteries to avoid staying in a collapsing world by solving puzzles!

This rule-discovering game was made for the Theana GameJam#27 in 7 days. Around 1 hour of playtime, with a bonus challenging section for the more motivated players. It draws heavy game-design inspiration from games like Taiji or The Witness.

name: Payday 3: Houston Breakout Tailor Pack
description:
Pick a side of the law and stick to it, or play both sides and get paid twice.
In the Houston Breakout you’ll find everything you need to blend in with criminals and law professionals.

name: Into Sandy's Cities
description:
Welcome to "Into Sandy's Cities". This MegaWAD shows what Doom 2 from an alternate universe might look like, with all 32 maps being made in the style of Sandy Petersen's original levels. And not just visually! Layouts, gimmicks, enemy placements, even all bugs, glitches, limitations and other quirks have been faithfully recreated.

This WAD doesn't distinguish between "good" or "bad", it just aims to recreate the original experience as accurately as possible, warts and all. It's a celebration of Doom 2, and a love letter to Petersen's design philosophy in particular.

name: Hard Nut to Crack
description: Blast through 32 chaotic levels to rockin' MIDIs from 'round the net! These short but weird levels, inspired by powerful mappers like Sandy Petersen, Stanley Stasiak (Castle of Evil), and Greytale (DARKHELL.WAD), include a wide variety of challenges and themes.

name: Undertale: Wildfire
description:
Undertale Wildfire is a fangame and prequel to the RPG Undertale. In this game you play as the second human - the Bravery SOUL - who fell to the Underground. Riley has spent roughly a month living among the Monsters of Snowdown, when one day a fateful encounter forces them to step out of the comfort of the small life they've built and begin a journey to New Home.

Using various trinkets, PLAYs, and your wits, you'll embark on a journey and confront monsters and puzzles along the way, and choose how you'll advance through the Underground. How will your Bravery manifest?

name: Death of the King
description:
The King of Robots has been betrayed.

Caught off-guard, he finds himself trapped in his Mech. The Mech itself can probably last until help arrives -- but its overheating core can't. Use an army of robots running around the Mech to try and stabilize it!

name: Orbit Puzzle
description: "Orbit Puzzle" is a puzzle game that lets you unravel the mysteries of ancient astronomy! Analyze the complex orbit of a given celestial body and accurately determine the rotational speed and radius of both the deferent and epicycle. Understand the geometric principles of epicycles and complete the path of the celestial body. Each level presents more challenging orbits, testing your logical thinking and problem-solving skills. Embark on an exciting journey to uncover the secrets of the universe from the perspective of an ancient astronomer!

name: 3D Puzzle: Courtyard
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Fortress Forge
description: As a mighty commander, you'll oversee the defense of your base and use weaponry to repel the oncoming hordes. Harness the unique properties of various soldiers and weapons to land devastating blows to the enemy!

name: BeatShooter
description: Shoot to the beat in this fast-paced rhythm rail shooter. Blast your way through a psychedelic musical universe, racking up combos and climbing the leaderboards. Easy to learn, challenging to master, with an ever-expanding track list that ensures the beat never stops.

name: Defenders
description: Face endless waves of monsters in Defenders, a thrilling roguelike game. Use WASD to move and the mouse to attack, battling basic monsters, elites, and bosses. Level up your character after each wave to enhance your abilities and survive the onslaught.

name: The Hunter Cursed by Night
description: A short-and-sweet 1-bit adventure game with real-time combat. Engage in ranged or close combat to defeat supernatural monsters. Upgrade your tools to progress deeper into the woods.

name: Groove Coaster Wai Wai Party!!!!: Chunithm Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: City Takeover: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tower Hover
description: Tower Hover is an endless building game where players stack sections of a skyscraper to create the tallest structure possible. The goal is to align each new section perfectly on top of the previous one. If the placement isn't accurate, the misaligned part gets cut off, making subsequent placements more challenging. The game ends when a section completely misses the tower. How high can you build before it all comes crashing down?

name: A Bibelot: Prototo
description: A retro arcade game with several difficulty modes, as well as high score and best time stats.

name: Terminal City
description:
What if you took 80s adventure games like Space Quest, crossed them with auto-runners like Canabalt and threw in a dash of Another World?

You'll need all your wits, cunning, and typing skills to make it in TERMINAL CITY, as you guide street-kid V-Loc on his quest to evade the evil Syndicate corpos and rescue his friends.

In a world of instant-deaths, no checkpoints and dead ends, how far will YOU get?

name: Persona 3 Portable: Kotone Cutscenes Project - PSP Version
description: The Kotone Cutscenes Project implements reanimated versions of every cutscene from the original PS2 release of Persona 3 to match the Female protagonist route of Persona 3 Portable. This includes alternative versions of scenes for choices exclusive to this route (eg. Theodore or Elizabeth).

name: Persona 3 Portable: Kotone Cutscenes Project - Steam Version
description: The Kotone Cutscenes Project implements reanimated versions of every cutscene from the original PS2 release of Persona 3 to match the Female protagonist route of Persona 3 Portable. This includes alternative versions of scenes for choices exclusive to this route (eg. Theodore or Elizabeth).

name: Perish
description: This game is a space shooter where players assume the role of a simulated fighter pilot battling enemy ships in the vastness of space.

name: Nightmare
description: This game places you in a besieged city filled with enemies.

name: Divine Light
description: This game is a shooter where players pilot a high-tech spacecraft through vast skies.

name: Bizarre
description:
The circus is in town! Step up and try your luck!

Take aim with the cannon, gun, or balls in each challenging event!

Smash those coconuts and take home a victory!

Can you beat the fair?

name: Combatant
description: This game features a classic yet fresh take on the snake gameplay.

name: The Silence
description: Dive into the dark depths of an abandoned hospital in "The Silence", a thrilling single-player horror game. Alone and abandoned, you awaken in a gloomy corridor, surrounded by crumbling walls and an oppressive feeling of isolation. But the silence is deceptive because you are never truly alone. A sinister presence stalks you, watching your every move from the shadows.

name: No Paint No Gain
description: They say that without pain, there is no gain... But in this game, if you don't paint you don't gain! Choose the color or material you want and decorate the train stations as you want. Before start painting you must clean the station to earn money and buy some materials... So don't pain

name: Slate
description: This game takes you into a colorful cartoon town.

name: YanYueDao Kill
description: This is a simple point-and-click game where you must slay demons at the right moment. Along the way, you can acquire exquisite cards to enhance your combat power.

name: Idle Game Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted an idle game without all the pesky obstructions like gameplay and graphics? Introducing Idle Game Simulator! Is it a game? No, it is a very serious and deep simulator. This is idle in its purest form, watch number go up without having to do anything at all!

name: Hentai Anime Girls Succubus: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Demolish
description: This game is a road racer where players drive a sports car down a challenging highway.

name: Sex Massage 2
description: Enter the captivating world of the visual novel SEX Massage 2 , where you take on the role of Daniel, a talented masseur and owner of a small massage parlor. Daniel is determined to elevate his business to new heights, but the path to success is filled with challenges and temptations.

name: Prison of Nightmare
description: Prison of Nightmare is a first-person psychological horror game that immerses players in a haunting and oppressive atmosphere. The game revolves around an ancient dark entity, a malevolent spirit that invades the protagonist's dreams, aiming to terrorize and eventually capture their soul.

name: Exit Station 7
description: You entered a train station and appear to be stuck in a loop. Multiple levels to test your observation skill. See if you have what it takes to escape the loop!

name: Runeflame
description: Runeflame is a point-and-click fantasy adventure with an open world and an emphasis on puzzle-solving. Guide your custom character through the immersive world of Runeflame, where secrets and magic have minds of their own.

name: Whisker President
description: Whisker President is a comedic, casual point-and-click game set in a cartoon style oval office. Armed with only a laser pointer and some glue, help the purresident achieve political success by making him stamp the bills, all while ensuring that distractions don't get in the way.

name: Escape The Forest
description: Can you escape the forest? Experience the isolation of being the last person in the dark woods. Uncover the mysteries of your missing neighbors and discover who or what took them from their homes, all while escaping with your life.

name: Blazing Crow
description: Blazing Crow is a SLG-based puzzle game(PUZ). The goal is to destroy all the electric towers! 4 action points can be allocated each round to move, use branches and attack towers. Dodge the spreading flames, they will kill anything; dodge the human shots, the bullets will destroy everything.

name: Knights of the Road
description: An adventure game with focus on acrobatics and discovering secrets. Classic platformer gameplay in the spirit of the 8-bit era games.

name: Paradise Girls
description: Welcome to Paradise Cove, your new home. Thanks to your twin who owns the local resort you have a place to stay and even a cushy job to work whenever you please. Now you can freely explore this beach front community, meet the various women and start a fresh life, find love, or just have fun.

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Zoo: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling Fever: Prime Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Isekaing: From Zero to Zero
description: Zoe is hit by the Truck-kun, and respawns in a pixel-art game, where she must face dangers in form of clichés, meaningless choices, a plot that has more holes than Swiss cheese, and other plagues of modern gaming. Also, every notable person is trying to sing her a song! Will she endure such torment?

name: Lu[Idle]
description: Lu[Idle] is an Idle/Clicker game where you play as a game developer making games to become the best game developer ever. Watch out for the rival game developer as he try's to stop you.

name: Cube Farm
description: A simple semi-idle farming game on mobile.

name: Mirror, Mirror
description:
Emily can’t wait to spend the first night in her recently purchased home, but it may not be as comforting as she hoped. This house still has an occupant, and they’re particularly smitten with the new owner.

Will Emily escape the evil that inhabits her seemingly peaceful new home, or will she get pulled into the darkness?

name: Puztrix
description:
Puztrix is a remake of the Gravnic game from inside the NES Puzznic game.

Vircon32 Game Features:
- 80 levels of the original game
- 2 skins
- High score saving and submitting for the original levels
- ability to turn music & sound on/off

name: Lootist
description: Sin descripción

name: Vampire Survivors: The Darkasso
description: The 1.11 update for Vampire Survivors adds The Darkasso, a new deck of Arcanas to be collected and used during runs. It also adds character skins, unlocked as final prizes for the main game Adventures.

name: Border Patrol
description: Border Patrol is a 2D comic-style simulation game where players take on the role of a border officer responsible for inspecting incoming and outgoing vehicles, searching for contraband, and dealing with corruption and forgery.

name: Fit My Dog: Dog's Puzzle Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Dog: Dog's Puzzle Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Dog: Dog's Puzzle Pack 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooking Arena Breakfast Bonanza
description: Sin descripción
